Create a Jeklly Blog

How to create a Jeklly Blog?

Posted by Neo Pi on November 12, 2022 · 1 min read

Environment

üíªOS: MacOS 13.0
üî®ARCH: Apple M1

Install Homebrew

ÂõΩÂÜÖÊ∫ê

/bin/zsh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://gitee.com/cunkai/HomebrewCN/raw/master/Homebrew.sh)"

ÂÆòÊñπÊ∫ê

/bin/zsh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"

Install Ruby

/usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"

brew install ruby

Check It

ruby -v
ruby 2.6.10p210 (2022-04-12 revision 67958) [universal.arm64e-darwin22]

Install Jekyll

sudo gem install bundler
sudo gem install -n /usr/local/bin/ jekyll

Chose your blog theme

All in Jekyll Theme Clone the jekyll repository

Run Jekyll to emulation

Config the ‚Äú__config.yml‚Äù file
And run Jekyll

bundle exec jekyll serve

Then you can view in ‚Äúhttp://127.0.0.1:4000‚Äù
